rules_text: Untap target creature you don't control and gain control of it. It gains haste until end of turn. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it. If you do, you gain life equal to its toughness.
flavor_text: [i]You see from the scattered bones in the antechamber that you have not been the first to seek this blade. Will you triumph where others have failed?[/i]
